methods.name: Base64ToImage
methods.description: Base 64 string to Image component.

methods.name: Base64ToString
methods.description: String Base 64 to String. Decode Base 64 to string. (Encode with block 'StringToBase64').

methods.name: CanvasToBase64
methods.description: Canvas Image to Base 64.

methods.name: CopyToASD
methods.description: Copy a file from path to ASD. Example: pathFile: /storage/emulated/0/my_file.txt destFile: /my_file_in_ASD.txt, that will copy my_file.txt into: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/my_file_in_ASD.txt

methods.name: CreateDirectory
methods.description: Create a directory. Start with /, example: /mydirectory, create a directory in /mnt/sdcard/mydirectory

methods.name: CreateDirectoryASD
methods.description: Create a directory. Start with /, example: /mydirectory, create a directory in /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/mydirectory

methods.name: DeleteDirectory
methods.description: Delete a directory. Start with /, example: /mydirectory, delete directory /mnt/sdcard/mydirectory

methods.name: DeleteDirectoryASD
methods.description: Delete a directory. Start with /, example: /mydirectory, delete directory /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/mydirectory

methods.name: DeleteFile
methods.description: Delete a file. Set absolute address, example: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/myfile.txt

methods.name: DownloadFile
methods.description: Download file from web to directory, example, address: http://mydomain.com/myfile.jpg destination: /mydirectory. Not return event.

methods.name: DownloadFileASD
methods.description: Download file from web to a directory, example, address: http://mydomain.com/myfile.jpg destination: /mydirectory. Download in:  /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/mydirectory. Not return event.

methods.name: DownloadFileToASD
methods.description: Download file from web to ASD, example, address: http://mydomain.com/myfile.jpg fileName: /myfile.txt. Not return event.

methods.name: FileExists
methods.description: Check if file exists. Set absolute address, example: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/myfile.txt Return true or false.

methods.name: FileToString
methods.description: Convert File to String Base64. filePath: Absolute address, start with /. Example:/storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/myFile.txt. To read assets packaged with an application (also works for the Companion) start just file name with // (two slashes).

methods.name: FileToStringASD
methods.description: Convert File to String Base64. Prefix the filename with / to read from a specific file on the SD card (for example: /image.png will read the file /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/image.png). To read assets packaged with an application (also works for the Companion) start the filename with // (two slashes).

methods.name: FileToStringDirect
methods.description: Convert File to String Base64. Set absolute address, example: /storage/emulated/0/Pictures/my_picture.png

methods.name: GetApi
methods.description: Get API.

methods.name: GetAsdPath
methods.description: Get App Specific Directory path (ASD). Example: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files

methods.name: GetMimeType
methods.description: Get mime type by extension. Write file extension, example: png or file name, example: image.png

methods.name: GetSdkCodeName
methods.description: Get SDK code name.

methods.name: ImageToBase64
methods.description: Image picture to Base 64.

methods.name: StringToBase64
methods.description: Base 64 to String. Encode string to Base 64 (Decode with block 'Base64ToString').

methods.name: StringToFile
methods.description: String Base 64 to File. Name file must begins with a slash (/), the file is written to the sdcard (for example, writing to /myFile.txt will write the file to /sdcard/myFile.txt).

methods.name: StringToFileASD
methods.description: String Base 64 to File. Name file must begins with a slash (/), the file is written to the sdcard (for example, writing to /myFile.txt will write the file to /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/myFile.txt Return: /myFile.txt).

methods.name: StringToFileASDAsyn
methods.description: Run asynchronously. String Base 64 to File. Name file must begins with a slash (/), the file is written to the sdcard (for example, writing to /myFile.txt will write the file to /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/myFile.txt).

methods.name: StringToFileASDDirect
methods.description: String Base 64 to File. Name file must begins with a slash (/), the file is written to the sdcard (for example, writing to /myFile.txt will write the file to /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/<namepackage>/files/myFile.txt).

methods.name: TakePictureToBase64
methods.description: Takes Thumbnail Picture with Camera and returns base64 string

methods.name: UriToPath
methods.description: Convert string resultUri to path of file.

methods.name: WebFileToString
methods.description: Download web small file and convert it to String. Example: http://mydomain.com/myfile.jpg

methods.name: WebFileToStringASD
methods.description: Download web small file and convert it to String. Example: http://mydomain.com/myfile.jpg Event: GotStringFromWebFile.

name: KIO4_Base64
helpString: Convert file to string in Base 64 and string in Base 64 to file. Get mime type of a file. Juan Antonio Villalpando - KIO4.COM

events.name: AfterCanvasBase64
events.description: This event is fired by block CanvasToBase64. The text argument `base64Data` is the base64 string of the image in Canvas.

events.name: AfterImageBase64
events.description: This event is fired by block ImageToBase64. The text argument `base64Data` is the base64 string of the picture in Image.

events.name: AfterPictureBase64
events.description: This event is fired by block TakePictureToBase64. The text argument `base64Data` is the base64 string of the image.

events.name: GotFile
events.description: This event is fired by blocks StringToFile, StringToFileASD and StringToFileASDAsyn.

events.name: GotString
events.description: This event is fired by blocks FileToString and FileToStringASD.

events.name: GotStringFromWebFile
events.description: This event is fired by block WebFileToStringASD.
